name: Tales From Deep Space (itch)
description:
Cerulean made a soundtrack for a fake game, so I made a fake game to go with the real soundtrack.

Created in Ren'Py, as you may have guess from the credits page, because it's the first thing I could figure out how to embed audio on.

There's a few endings. Some are good, some are bad, one is true. None of that's explicitly stated in the endings. What's good and bad is relative.
